Obito delivers a series of strikes to the opponent with a combination of [[Kamui]], a shuriken and [[Wood Release: Cutting Technique]]. Then he creates [[black receiver]]s which rain on the opponent. Finally, Obito uses [[Demonic Statue Chains]] to pick up the stakes and smash them to the opponent.
